name: Not so Rogue-like
description:
A simple maze solving game inspired by the classic roguelike look and feel. 

Entry for the Cyberpunk jam 2014. Not related to the theme at all (never liked it anyway) and barely cyberpunkish at all, but who cares when you just want to make a game?

Not so Rogue-like is and uses free software, it's source code can be downloaded here https://github.com/sagge-miky/Not-so-Rogue-like.
